mapper.select: SELECT u.seq , u.id , u.name , u.nickname , u.type_code AS typeCode , u.status_code AS statusCode , u.grade_code AS gradeCode , (SELECT name FROM sm_common WHERE group_code=15 AND value=u.grade_code) AS gradeText , u.login_token AS loginToken , u.last_date AS lastDate , u.reg_date AS regDate FROM sm_user u LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_admin a ON(a.seq=u.seq) WHERE u.type_code IN ('A', 'P') ORDER BY u.type_code ASC, u.seq ASC

SELECT u.seq , u.id , u.password , u.name , u.nickname , u.type_code AS typeCode , u.status_code AS statusCode , u.grade_code AS gradeCode , (SELECT name FROM sm_common WHERE group_code=15 AND value=u.grade_code) AS gradeText , u.login_token AS loginToken , u.last_ip AS lastIp , u.last_date AS lastDate , u.temp_password AS tempPassword , u.temp_password_date AS tempPasswordDate , u.mod_password_date AS modPasswordDate , u.mod_date AS modDate , u.reg_date AS regDate , a.email , a.tel , a.cell FROM sm_user u LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_admin a ON(a.seq=u.seq) WHERE u.seq=#{seq} ORDER BY u.type_code ASC, u.seq ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM sm_user WHERE seq=#{seq}
